targets.expr:
100 * (
  ( (
sum(increase(youtrack_TotalCachingJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance"  }[$__rate_interval]))
+
sum(increase(youtrack_TotalCachingCountJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance"  }[$__rate_interval]))
) * 1000 / $__rate_interval_ms
 )
  -
  ( (
sum(increase(youtrack_TotalCachingJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance"  }[$__rate_interval] offset ${offset}))
+
sum(increase(youtrack_TotalCachingCountJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance"  }[$__rate_interval] offset ${offset}))
)  * 1000 / $__rate_interval_ms
 )
)
/
( round( (
sum(increase(youtrack_TotalCachingJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance"  }[$__rate_interval] offset ${offset}))
+
sum(increase(youtrack_TotalCachingCountJobsEnqueued{  instance=~"$instance"  }[$__rate_interval] offset ${offset}))
)  * 1000 / $__rate_interval_ms
 , 0.0001) != 0 )
